Summary: we see a bright light almost every night.theres blue streaks also
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Newton
There were no other sightings in Newton on or around March 5th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailstheres a bright light that has blue streaks that appears pretty regular.it hovers for awhile then it will move somewhere out of sight after awhile.when i first saw it,i pointed it out to someone and they said it was the north star and so i thought nothing of it for awhile.but then one night it didnt appear so then i knew then where wrong.it seems to be getting closer to earth.i also have noticed that there are 2 more obects that have the same appearance and they to seem to be getting closer to earth.my camcorder isnt working so i cant get any footage.and my cell phone wont take a picture at night.
